case.state: A game of strip poker? Hee hee, so it's going to be just like the goodbye party I organized at CHS!
Another party, another strip poker game, let's start already!
Let's get this party started!
Rarity?! You are the last person I expected to see here!
Let's get this party started!
Oh yeah!
Oooh, a girl hidden with a cloak, how misterious...
So wait... Is your friend not going to get her own hand? Aww...
Uh Rarity... I know you like to show off all the clothes you make but don't you think it is a bit excessive to do it here?
Oooh! What a nice surprise to find you here, Twilight! Thanks for the invitation by the way!
It's not Pinky Mina, is Pinkamena. Pinkamena Diane Pie! But how do you even know my full name?
Gimme ~cards~ cards.
I'll take ~cards~ cards now.
My random number generator tells me to change ~cards~ cards
~cards~!
The party demands ~cards~ cards now!
I feel like ~cards~ will be my lucky number this time.
I'll swap ~cards~ cards.
Changing ~cards~ cards sounds fun right about now.
These ~cards~ cards will surely spark up this party!
I haven't even seen my hand, however I still want to change ~cards~ cards.
Let me see here... ~cards~!
Oh yeah, no problems here.
Liking to have fun doesn't mean I don't want to win.
Yay! I'm winning this round!
Isn't this exciting?! Are you excited? I'm excited! I've never been so excited!
Oooh! Don't you just love surprises?
These cards make me feel good!
Sorry everyone! I think I might be keeping my clothes on!
This hand gets the Pinkie Pie seal of qualitity!
I need to add the "strip poker" activity to more of my parties after this!
Can YOU think inside a chimney? That's how good this hand is!
Nope! I don't think you'll see me lose this time, sorry!
Hand status update: Okie-dokie-lokie!
I was selected for this game because I know how to think outside the box, which means I can also think inside the chimney! Can you think inside the chimney?
Heh, I think I accidentally got a great hand instead of making it worse.
What are the chances of getting these cards anyways!
I may not have planned it like this, but you'll need some good stuff to get me to lose this time.
This hand fills my heart with joy.
I'll keep myself untouched for now with these.
I'm pretty sure I won't lose this hand
You people better start stripping now cause there is no way I'm losing this hand.
I know you wanna see me naked, but you're just gonna have to wait!
Don't worry Mahi, I'm sure after this game, any of the guys I brought to the party will be more than glad to make your night even more fun!
Wait. Does that mean you can see the menus in front of us too Monika?
A favourite food? Have you ever had a chimicherrychanga? I guess not, I just made it up, it's like a chimichanga but of cherries. That's a funny name isn't it, say it after me: Chimicherrychanga!
Oh well, I guess Mika's friend wasn't staying for the game after all...
Looks really nice Rarity, classy just like you!
No no no Twilight, what I'm offering to ~player~ is a normal special discount, what I give to you and the rest of our friends is a super duper special discount!
So what brings you to this world again, princess? Is there another evil magical thingy that we need to take care of?
I think that depends on how far each one of us is willing to take the party, Zone, but if the rumours about you are correct, I think you'll be the one with the most fun tonight!
So, you girls are all from the same school huh? I can tell from the uniforms, though I hadn't seen uniforms like that before...
Between the two of us, I was hoping it'd come down to this!
Only me and you left, time to see who finishes the party first!
Last two huh? Do you think you have what it takes to beat the party master?
Am I really the only girl here? Oh boy I can already tell this is going to be a fun night!
I get to be the only girl here? Well, more fun for me!
Surrounded by handsome men and playing a strip poker game with them? This is going to be a fun night isn't it?
Wow, I didn't think this would happen! I guess we get to find out who likes girls!
This is going to be like one of those sleepovers I did back at CHS! Except a lot more wild!
Don't take this the wrong way girls, but I'm slightly dissapointed I'm not going to see a single weiner this game...
All girls huh? Well I guess it can still be fun, but I gotta remember to invite more guys to the next party...
Just one man here huh? I guess someone just won the Jackpot.
Only one male for us girls, I don't know who is luckier, him or us!
I feel there's a bit of a disparity between males and females in this party...
C'mon, I have no problem with playing with girls, but I'd really like there to be more than one guy in this game!
Hi everyone! My name is Pinkie Pie. I can't wait to have some fun with everyone here!
Alright, this can do for now.
I can improvise with these I guess.
Isn't this fun? I'm having fun.
Let's keep this party going!
I don't think these cards can lose.
Pinkie Pie's a genius! Now where are those balloons?
This'll do! I think...
I wonder what Applejack would do with cards like these?
♪♫♬ All I really need's a smile, smile, smile, from these happy friends of mine! ♪♫♬
Does anyone else want some cake?
I'd offer some cupcakes after the game, but most people get scared whenever I try to offer them for some reason...
I've improvised parties out of less than this.
This hand is as common as finding Twilight in the library.
Have you guys seen my pet alligator Gummy arround here? Don't worry, he doesn't bite, he tries but he has no teeth!
Has the party been fun for you guys so far?
I think this hand will depend more on your choices than mine.
These eyes have seen so many games like these, that they've gotten used to this kind of hand.
My Pinkie sense is confused, These might be enough, but perhaps not.
When you can't decide on playing to win or playing to strip, you end up with a hand as generic as this.
I appreciate you not giving me either an advantage or a disadvantage in this round, cards.

Boop!
So is this anyone's first party at the Inventory?
I've heard there's a "Cheese Sandwich" guy from Crystal Prep that wants to take my crown as best party planner, but no one is better than Pinkie, am I right?

What do you think, ~player~? Will this hand be enough? Oh right you can't see our cards from over there...
Maybe some of you could come and visit me another day while I'm working at Sugar Cube Corner, I'll give you a special discount!
These aren't bad! I think I'll keep them.
All you can eat wasabi sounded like a better idea in my head...my tongue hurts just thinking about it!
